ygData.subject: Re: OOC r/l musical bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of the musical abilities of bard is  game has nothing to do with what musical training I have :-) My lyrics are shotty at best, but it doesn t stop me
ygData.messageBody:
Most of the musical abilities of bard is game has nothing to do with what
musical training I have :-) My lyrics are shotty at best, but it doesn't stop me
from trying! Two years of college music playing brass instruments-- everything
from Mozart to Ska and back again :-)

--Shulzari
Poswardd E'ci
http://www.soerbaird.com



James Schuldes wrote:

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> So we are all real good online Bards and have excellent musical abilities to
> the point of powerful magic, etc. But what about in /ooc real life? Anyone
> have any talent or interest?
